Aniket's Notes

Basic code is given below

from xgboost import XGBClassifier

xgb = XGBClassifier(n_estimators=500, early_stopping_rounds=5)
xgb.fit(x_train,y_train,eval_set=[(x_val,y_val)])

result = xgb.predict(x_test)

n_esimators will decide how many cycles will algorithm run early_stopping_rounds after how many cycles of degrading score will algorithm stops
